alert.note: Alert for Linn (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 12:54AM CDT until August 12 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Linn County in north central Missouri... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1253 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Linneus, or 13 miles northwest of Brookfield, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brookfield, Marceline, Linneus, Browning, Purdin and Saint Catherine. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
